      Methods in org.infinispan.metadata that return Metadata.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metadata.Builder Metadata.builder()
      Returns an instance of Metadata.Builder which can be used to build new instances of Metadata instance which are full copies of this Metadata.
      Metadata.Builder EmbeddedMetadata.builder() 
      Metadata.Builder Metadata.Builder.lifespan(long time)
      Set lifespan time assuming that the time unit is milliseconds.

      Set lifespan time with a given time unit.
      Metadata.Builder EmbeddedMetadata.Builder.lifespan(long time, TimeUnit unit) 
      Metadata.Builder Metadata.Builder.maxIdle(long time)
      Set max idle time assuming that the time unit is milliseconds.

      Set max idle time with a given time unit.
      Metadata.Builder EmbeddedMetadata.Builder.maxIdle(long time, TimeUnit unit) 
      Metadata.Builder Metadata.Builder.merge(Metadata metadata)
      Merges the given metadata information into the given builder.
      Metadata.Builder EmbeddedMetadata.Builder.merge(Metadata metadata)

      Set version.
